Package image

Interface Summary
ImageReader Interface that must be implemented by any image reader.
 

Class Summary
GifReader Implementation of an image reader for images in gif format.
Image Abstraction of an image used in a LayeredInitialization example.
ImageReaderFactory This class creates instances of classes that read images in specific formats, e.g., gif, jpeg, png, ...
JpegReader Implementation of an image reader for images in jpeg format.
Pixels Abstraction of the pixels of an image.
PngReader Implementation of an image reader for images in png format.
